label: Stateless Fan Speed Mode button
description: Allows for the control of a device with stateless fan speed mode buttons

availableFanspeedModeButtons.label: configured buttons
availableFanspeedModeButtons.description: A list of commands/buttons that have been configured in the device

setButton.label: setButton
setButton.description: Emulate the pressing of a supported button

button.description: The button in availableFanspeedModeButtons to send to the device
